articles.description: In the world of video calling apps, Zoom and Google Duo are two of the best. Depending on how you plan on using them, however, one is likely a much better fit.

articles.description: The latest Oppo midranger is already on sale in China.
articles.content:
Oppo is on a row lately and the latest midrange device from the manufacturer to go official is the brand new A52. The phone was launched in China earlier today with a four-camera setup, Snapdragon 665 chipset and a beefy 5,000 mAh battery.
